      • setEmptyViewTexts

        public MultiChoiceForm.Builder setEmptyViewTexts(java.lang.String title,
                                                 java.lang.String message)
        If a MCFStep does not have any data associated with it, it will show an empty view when prompted. This method defines both the title and the message that will show on the empty view.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of EmptyView.
        message - Message of EmptyView.
        Returns:
        Current instance of this builder.

      • setSearchViewHint

        public MultiChoiceForm.Builder setSearchViewHint(java.lang.String hint)
        If a MCFStep is searchable, this is used to show the SearchView's hint.
        Parameters:
        hint - hint of SearchView.
        Returns:
        Current instance of this builder.

      • setToolbarIconTint

        public MultiChoiceForm.Builder setToolbarIconTint(int color)
        If a MCFStep is searchable, this is used to show the Toolbar's icon. Takes the app's theme R.attr.colorAccent by default.
        Parameters:
        color - tint color of the Toolbar icon.
        Returns:
        Current instance of this builder.

      • setHasAutoFocus

        public MultiChoiceForm.Builder setHasAutoFocus(boolean hasAutoFocus)
        Only applicable to the MCFTextInputSteps.
        Parameters:
        hasAutoFocus - whether the MCFTextInputSteps have auto focus.
        Returns:
        Current instance of this builder.
